name: Villa Florida

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: just excellent service

likes.liked: — The friendliness, helpfulness and the shower!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms were beautifully presented & the en-suite bathroom very nice & modern. The breakfast was excellent. Our host Nicole spoke good english & was very helpful. She had an excellent suggestion for a restaurant which she booked for us & also gave us a very good itinerary for suggested walks in the area. This was a very pleasant stay - we just wish we could have stayed longer.
reviews.title: Perfect

reviews.text: Nicole and Daniel Issanchou have created a gem. They are charming and work very hard and it really shows in the results. We came to watch and ride the Tour de France Pyrénées stages but also found something special. We can’t say enough wonderful things about Nicole, Daniel and the Villa Florida. The guest rooms and other parts of this restored house from the late 1800’s are wonderful and reflect the care that they put into the two year renovation of their labor of love. The breakfast and the (optional) dinner are magnificent. Nicole loves to cook and you will be the beneficiary of her skills and use of fresh ingredients. I am not someone who throws around the superlatives but we truly loved our stay, were very pleased with the service and value and would recommend Villa Florida without any hesitation. The bonus is that it is located in the delightful town of Bagnères-de-Luchon nestled in the Pyrénées.
reviews.title: A great find!

reviews.text: We were following the Tour De France when we stayed here and the hosts of this B&B were very helpful in finding out information about road closures etc for us.Our room was huge and nicely decorated however the beds were so hard and uncomfortable we found it hard to sleep well.The bathroom was large however there was only a handheld shower in the bath so it was hard to have a shower in the morning.
reviews.title: Charming Hosts

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast was lovely with homemade fruitsalad,jams etc however as we are not used to B&Bs found having to sit around a communal table not to our taste.
reviews.title: Highly reccomended
Great Experience at Villa Florida
reviews.text: We stayed here for 3 nights in June. The location is great, with car parking facilities. The rooms have been beautifully renovated and the shower in the bathroom was fantastic.

description: Classified "3 épis" by "Gîtes de France", situated in the heart of Luchon, "Queen of Pyrenees", the Bed and Breakfast Villa Florida provides a quiet and pleasant living environment, in a large and impressive house of the 19th Century, in front the Thermal Baths lake, and just a step away from all downtown conveniences. Parking and skis / bicycles shed. WiFi available - 5 large and well designed bedrooms. Breakfast for 2 included.
